"""
   SOAP env module, a module defining the computing environment.
   
   Please check imported module for dependence, and define the paths in this file
   

"""

[docs]class env(object):
    """
        This class defines the directory and other enviroment variables for all the other classes.
        
        Please redefine the variables for

    
    """
    def __init__(self):
        #define hostnames
        self.localHost='bell.ucsf.edu'#for storing results and tables and controlling everything
        self.sgeServer='baton2.compbio.ucsf.edu'#for submitting jobs on sge cluster, ssh key authencation needed for passwordless access
        self.userName="gqdong" #  must use RSA Key for SSH Authentication
        self.localStatPotPath='/bell3/gqdong/statpot/'
        self.localDecoysPath='/bell2/gqdong/rawdecoyfiles/'
        self.localProcessedPDBPaths=['/bell2/gqdong/pdb/pdb3/','/bell2/gqdong/biounit/']
        self.serverProcessedPDBPaths=['/netapp/sali/gqdong/pdb/','/netapp/sali/gqdong/biounits/']
        self.localRawPDBPath='/salilab/park2/database/pdb/divided/'
        self.serverRawPDBPath='/netapp/database/pdb/remediated/pdb/'
        self.serverLogPath='/netapp/sali/gqdong/output/' # for storing logs when path name contains "#"
        self.serverUserPath='/netapp/sali/gqdong/'
        self.serverHDF5Path='/scrapp2/gqdong/hdf5/' # for storing hdf5 tables on sge server, temporary use only
        self.localInstallPath='/bell1/home/gqdong/SOAP/'
        self.serverInstallPath='/netapp/sali/gqdong/SOAP/'
        self.serverScrathPath='/scrapp/gqdong/'# for storing temporary results
        self.localRunCachePath='/bell2/gqdong/runs/'
        self.localResultDB='/bell1/home/gqdong/Dropbox/spresults/resultdb.sql3'
        self.hostname=hostname      
        if self.hostname==self.localHost:
            self.hostn=0#local
            self.basedir=self.localStatPotPath
            self.loopStructurePath=self.basedir+'loop/'
            self.ddbdir=self.localDecoysPath
            self.pdbdir=self.localProcessedPDBPaths
            self.opdbdir=self.localRawPDBPath
            self.decoysbasedir=self.basedir+'Decoys/'
            self.pdbpirdir=self.basedir+'pdbpir/'
            self.jobserver=self.userName+'@'+self.sgeServer
            self.scriptdir=self.localInstallPath
            #self.scriptpath='/bell1/home/gqdong/Dropbox/Code/sp.py'
            self.logpath=self.basedir+'scorelog'
            self.runs=self.localRunCachePath
            self.otherrun=True #True, there are other instances doing the same run or there aren't
            self.currentrundirlist=[]
            self.jobserverhdf5path=self.serverHDF5Path
            self.resultdbpath=self.localResultDB
            self.libdir=self.localInstallPath+'lib/'            
            self.debug=True
        else:
            self.hostn=1
            self.loopStructurePath=self.serverUserPath+'loop/'
            self.basedir=os.getenv("RUNPATH")
            self.ddbdir=self.serverUserPath+'decoys/'
            self.pdbdir=self.serverProcessedPDBPaths #'/netapp/database/pdb/remediated/pdb/'#
            self.opdbdir=self.serverRawPDBPath
            self.decoysbasedir=None
            self.libdir=self.serverInstallPath+'lib/'
        self.runpriority=0
        self.env=environ()
        log.none()
        self.mcmc_temperature_ratios1=[3,3,2.5,2.5,2,2,1.5,1.5,1,1]
        self.acc_rate_ratio=1.0
        self.stepblockind=-1
        self.mcmc_pt=(1,10)
        self.queues=''
        self.numofthread=0
        self.queue=Queue.Queue() #queue item format [func, [paras]]
        self.spdsscoreTasks={}
            
    def log(self,sdict):#obsolete
        logstrfile=open(self.basedir+'score.summary','a')
        logstrfile.write(sdict['string']+'\n')
        logstrfile.close()
        if os.path.isfile(self.basedir+'score.summary.pickle'):
            logcPicklefile=open(self.basedir+'score.summary.pickle','rb')
            loglist=cPickle.load(logcPicklefile)
            loglist.append(sdict)
            logcPicklefile.close()
        else: 
            loglist=[]+[sdict]
        logcPicklefile=open(self.basedir+'score.summary.pickle','wb')
        cPickle.dump(loglist,logcPicklefile)
        logcPicklefile.close()

    def setup_threadpool(self):
        print "###setup thread pool"
        for i in range(self.numofthread):
            t = ThreadClass()
            t.setDaemon(True)
            t.start()
        print '###setup thread pool finished'


runenv=env()

class ThreadClass(threading.Thread):
    # will take any jobs from queue, while the queue 
    def __init__(self):
        threading.Thread.__init__(self)
        self.queue = runenv.queue

    def run(self):
        while True:
            inputlist=self.queue.get()
            #st=time.time()
            inputlist[0](*inputlist[1])
            #print "calculation time "+str(time.time()-st)
            self.queue.task_done()
        print "quit"




#set up scratch dir and host specific modules
if runenv.hostn==0:
    import pdb
    import matplotlib
    matplotlib.use('Agg')
    import matplotlib.pylab as plt
    import signal
    import shelve
    from filelock import *
    import pypchip
    scratchdir='/scratch'
else:
    if not os.getenv('JOB_ID'):
        scratchdir='/scratch/gqdong/temp/'
        if not os.path.isdir(scratchdir):
            os.makedirs(scratchdir)
    else:
        import statvfs
        print os.statvfs("/scratch")
        dfs=os.statvfs("/scratch")
        if (dfs[statvfs.F_BAVAIL]*dfs[statvfs.F_BSIZE])>100000000:
            scratchdir=runenv.serverScrathPath+os.getenv('JOB_ID')+'/'+os.getenv('SGE_TASK_ID')+'/'
        else:
            scratchdir=runenv.serverScrathPath+os.getenv('JOB_ID')+'/'+os.getenv('SGE_TASK_ID')+'/'
        #scratchdir='/scrapp/gqdong/'+os.getenv('JOB_ID')+'/'+os.getenv('SGE_TASK_ID')+'/'
        if not os.path.isdir(scratchdir):
            os.makedirs(scratchdir)
